page.syntax: Result_Flag as L = .Exists( Logical_Image_Name as C )

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: True (.T.) indicates that the image name was found in the dictionary. False (.F.) indicates that it was not found.

argument.name: Logical_Image_Name
argument.description: The name of a logical image name.

page.description: The .Exists() method determines if a logical image name exists in the string dictionary.
page.example: dim ir as P dim nm as P ir = ImageResource.get() nm = ir.GetBitmapNameMap() nm.Initialize(<<%str% a5_control:browse=$a5_browse %str%) ? nm.exists("a5_control:browse") = .T.
